sectionWithDescription.title: Cocktail Profile
sectionWithDescription.description: A martini is a simple marriage of gin and dry vermouth (which has never enjoyed the same acclaim as its cousin, sweet vermouth). This martini variation tempers the intensity of dry vermouth with a little help from Italy in the form of Aperol. The drinkâ€™s appealing balance offers a first step toward enjoying the classic medley of vermouth, gin, and a bitter (does that formula sound familiar?).
